column4: hey guys, quick question...During my install I wasnt connected to the internet. Consequently ubuntu didnt take something from http://security.ubuntu.com Now I find that I cant access any of the programs from the add programs database. I guess these things are connected, any clues on what I should do?
try opening a terminal and typing: sudo apt-get update then try again
system > administration > software sources and make sure that the first 4 checkboxes are checked
